statements: SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, occupation FROM demographic_data WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT id, name, city FROM demographic_data WHERE occupation = 'Engineer';
SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT id, age, occupation FROM demographic_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC, age DESC
SELECT id, name, occupation FROM demographic_data WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE occupation = 'Engineer' AND city = 'San Francisco' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT name, city FROM demographic_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY city ASC, name DESC
SELECT id, occupation, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE city IN ('Chicago', 'Los Angeles') ORDER BY occupation DESC
SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT id, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT decision_name, description FROM public_policy_decisions WHERE impact_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT id, income FROM demographic_data WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender ASC
SELECT id, income FROM demographic_data WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT id, age, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM public_policy_decisions WHERE impact_rating >= 3
SELECT decision_name, description FROM public_policy_decisions
SELECT * FROM public.demographic_data;
SELECT id, age, gender, income FROM public.demographic_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, gender, income FROM public.demographic_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM public.policy_preferences WHERE support_level > 3;
SELECT policy_name, support_level FROM public.policy_preferences ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT id, age, gender, income FROM public.demographic_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM public.policy_preferences WHERE support_level >= 3 ORDER BY policy_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT impact_id, policy_id, population_affected, impact_description FROM public.policy_impacts WHERE population_affected > 100000 ORDER BY impact_id DESC;
SELECT d.id, d.age, p.policy_name, p.support_level FROM public.demographic_data AS d JOIN public.policy_preferences AS p ON d.age < 40 AND d.id = p.policy_id;

SELECT d.id, d.gender, pi.impact_description FROM public.demographic_data AS d LEFT JOIN public.policy_impacts AS pi ON d.id = pi.policy_id AND pi.population_affected < 50000 ORDER BY d.id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM person;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM person WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT person_id, occupation FROM person WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM address ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT person_id, income, education_level FROM demographic_data WHERE income >= 50000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM person WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM address WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY street DESC

SELECT person.first_name, address.city, demographic_data.income FROM person JOIN address ON person.person_id = address.person_id JOIN demographic_data ON person.person_id = demographic_data.person_id WHERE demographic_data.education_level = 'Graduate'
SELECT first_name, last_name, occupation, decision_description FROM person JOIN policy_decision ON person.person_id = policy_decision.person_id

SELECT person.first_name, address.city, demographic_data.income, policy_decision.approval_date FROM person JOIN address ON person.person_id = address.person_id JOIN demographic_data ON person.person_id = demographic_data.person_id JOIN policy_decision ON person.person_id = policy_decision.person_id WHERE policy_decision.approval_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY policy_decision.approval_date DESC
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT id, age, gender FROM demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM education WHERE level = 'Bachelor' ORDER BY graduation_year DESC;
SELECT id, company_name, position FROM employment WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT family_size, spouse_gender, children_count FROM family WHERE income_level > 50000;
SELECT * FROM demographics ORDER BY age DESC, income ASC
SELECT gender, income, location FROM demographics WHERE age > 30
SELECT field_of_study, graduation_year FROM education WHERE level = 'Bachelor'
SELECT company_name, position, end_date FROM employment WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT family_size, spouse_gender, income_level FROM family
